channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: TAIEX Hits Record High With Boost From TSMC
item.description: Taiwan's stock exchange closed at a record high on Tuesday, buoyed by chipmaker TSMC being awarded US$6.6 billion in U.S. subsidies for its Arizona project.

item.title: TSMC Charity Foundation Offers Help for Hualien Earthquake Relief Efforts
item.description: Sophie Chang, head of the TSMC Charity Foundation, arrived in Hualien to talk to earthquake victims and offer relief to the battered city.

item.title: Young People in Taiwan Left Behind Amid Skyrocketing Property Prices
item.description: Real estate agents worry that young Taiwanese people will be unable to enter the property market after reports show prices have increased by as much as 82% since 2020.

item.title: Formosan Black Bear 'Liyasung' Released Back Into Wild
item.description: An endangered Formosan black bear named "Lisayung" by local Atayal people has been released back into the wild four months after she was found caught in an illegal hunting trap.
